entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
